name: Funny Fruits
description:
Funny Fruits is an addictive match 3 puzzle game, with enough levels to keep you playing for months! All this for less than a coffee, an incredibly low price!

• HUNDREDS of levels to challenge your mind!
• Special combo items
• Arcade and Classic play modes
• Level up ranking
• Great sound effects
• Unlock new fruits by completing levels
• NO IN-APP PURCHASES
• NO ADS
• 100% PURE FUN

Download now and enjoy fruit matching.
Don't forget to leave a rating after playing the game, every extra star counts!
